title: Chris Redd | Zelenskyy Predicts Putin Will Compromise as Major Businesses Flee Russia: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the Biden administration doing everything possible to counter Russia’s invasion of Ukraine as Republicans pitch increasingly reckless ideas that would drastically escalate the conflict.

Then, Chris Redd talks about the inspiration behind his show Bust Down, giving his haters credit for not supporting his rap career and impersonating Mayor Eric Adams on Saturday Night Live.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
